prompts: Create a cute fairy-type Pokemon that glows in the dark and has fluffy ears.
Imagine a Pokemon with pink fur and sparkling wings, perfect for a magical forest.
Design a friendly creature with a round body and playful expressions, ideal for children's games.
Give me a whimsical Pokemon that combines elements of both fairy and psychic types.
Show me a small, pink Pokemon that loves to sing and dance under the moonlight.
Generate an adorable bipedal creature with large expressive eyes and a cheerful demeanor.
Make a charming Pokemon that can evolve into a more powerful form with a special item.
